name: WARSPACE!
description:
Welcome to WARSPACE! In this game, you command a space ship and defy all odds as you defeat tough enemies. They're probably aliens or something, idk. Anyways, use epic dodges and laser snipes in this tactical arcade game! Compete with your friends to get the highest score, my favorite part of the game. Use different kinds of EXTRAORDINARY powerups to mow down enemy starships! Explore 10 challenging level with many different enemy types!

The game is free but you can also donate if you would like to! More games are on the way!

I am a new indie game developer and this is the first project I have published on itch.io!!
